page.title: 02 LIFE STYLES
page.content: MRS SHERRYS DAY.SHE GOT UP AT 7:00am,HAD A SHOWER,WASHED HER HAIR,GOT DRESSED,WENT DOWN STAIRS FED THE CATS AND HAD BREAKFAST.SHE DROVE TO SCHOOL AND TAUGHT HER CLASS ALL DAY.SHE WENT SHOPPING AND FILLED THE CAR UP WITH PETROL.SHE CLEANED THE HOUSE AND HAD DINNER WHICH SHE HAD COOKED.AFTER DINNER SHE MARKED SOME SCHOOL BOOKS AND PREPARED SOME QUESTIONS FOR THE SCIENCE MUSEUM VISIT,WATCHED TELEVISION AND READ THE TELEGRAPH NEWSPAPER AND WENT TO BED AT 11:00pm. GARETHS DAY WATCHED BREAKFAST TELEVISION AND PREPARED CRISPS AND SANDWICHES FOR LUNCH.RODE TO SCHOOL ON BICYCLE AND PLAYED FOOTBALL BEFORE SCHOOL STARTED AT 9.00AM.HAD BREAKS FROM LESSONS AT 10.40 AND 12.15 AFTER SCHOOL PLAYED WITH COMPUTER.BED.
